author: treyzania
content: Is there a reason why nobody has proposed some kind of "miniEVM"-based AA design which specifies upfront all the storage it's going to access and doesn't allow for backwards jumps so you can statically reason about the maximum amount of gas it's going to use?

author: treyzania
content: Is that something the EOF work could enable in the future?  Ie. object sections that specify storage layout to enable preloading

author: rjected
content: strict access lists are pretty powerful yeah
